analysis.description:
Dcmc.transfer (/unique_chucks/2/0xfeca834e7da9d437645b474450688da9327112a5.sol#517-524) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > lockups[_to]) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfeca834e7da9d437645b474450688da9327112a5.sol)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > lockups[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/2/0xfeca834e7da9d437645b474450688da9327112a5.sol)
